name: DynamicSpellbook
description: Provides a command to generate a dynamic spellbook in the chat window. Each spell is presented as a clickable command button. By specifying command options, the list of spells can be filtered in various ways. Optionally applies /fx commands to matching spells, when used in conjunction with FxLoader.js.*Compatible with the 5th Edition OGL Community Sheet.*## Commands```!dsb [--help] [--prepared-only] [--filter-by-level <levels>] [--apply-fx]```* `--help` -- Displays in game help.* `--prepared-only` -- Filters the spellbook to only contain prepared spells* `--filter-by-level <levels>` -- Filters the spellbook to only contain spells of a certain level. The `<levels>` argument should contain a comma separated list of spell levels e.g. `--filter-by-level 0,1,2,3`.* `--apply-fx` -- Apply /fx commands to the spells.## Applying FXTo automatically apply /fx commands to the generated spell buttons, the `--apply-fx` option should be used in conjunction with the FxLoader.js script.rovides a command to generate a dynamic spellbook in the chat window.
